body_html: Thank you very much, the problem has been solved. As drpngx said, when I run "nvidia-smi", the server also stoped working. As a result, I re-install the CUDA and Cudnn, then all the problem has been solved. Not intentionally, maybe someone who share the same machine or even I myself had changed some configuration. All in all, thank you very much.

body: Thank you very much, the problem has been solved. As **drpngx** said, when I run "nvidia-smi", the server also stoped working. As a result, I re-install the CUDA and Cudnn, then all the problem has been solved. Not intentionally, maybe someone who share the same machine or even I myself had changed some configuration.  All in all, thank you very much.
